App_title: CLINICAL: Medical treatment and health information you can trust

Main_heading.head: About CLINICAL
Main_heading.p: Our medical center specializes in pneumology, chest and the respiratory system's health, we integrate clinical and hospital care with research and education.

Team.title: Our Team
Team.p: Our team of renouned medical specialists will provide the best possible medical treatment, using the latest technology and the most sophisticated healthcare methods.

Treatments.title: Our Treatments
Treatments.p: In CLINICAL, we make sure our patients recieve the best medical treatment, using the most advanced technologies and modern medecine.

Newsletters.title: Our Newsletters
Newsletters.p: We decided to make newsletters so we can inform not just our patients, but everyone who cares about their lungs and their overall respiratory system's health.
